Row.Text: A new year has dawned,[NEWLINE]and your people desire a festival[NEWLINE]to mark the occasion.[NEWLINE]They look to you to sponsor the event
Throw a lavish celebration for 10 [ICON_GOLD] per population.
Appease them with simple festivities for 2 [ICON_GOLD] per population.
Do nothing, the ungrateful wretches should be[NEWLINE]throwing a party to celebrate you!
There is a food shortage in your lands.[NEWLINE]Current number of cities facing starvation: {1_iStarveCities}
Import shipments of food to tide your people over
Force Population out of the effected cities[NEWLINE]and into work camps
Let the situation work itself out
Converts starving civilians into manpower[NEWLINE]Lowers Happiness[ICON_HAPPINESS] by 10
A bountiful harvest has brought in[NEWLINE]an excess of{1_iFoodBonus} [ICON_FOOD] food
Divide the food among your cities.
Create a food bank for the poor.
Sell the harvest to another nation.
Your people have witnessed what[NEWLINE]they believe to have been a[NEWLINE]a Great Dragon decending from the sky.
Proclaim it to be a god.
Claim it is a sign of your divine rule.
Nothing Happened. No one saw anything.
The old tribal hierarchies[NEWLINE]are collapsing, your people[NEWLINE]are undergoing a cultural shift.
The nobles in your court believe[NEWLINE]a new tax would[NEWLINE]benifit your government.
Place a tax on luxury goods.
As the sovereign leader,[NEWLINE] you have been placed incharge[NEWLINE]of the Church's direction.
Establish your religion in all[NEWLINE]your cities.
Invest in the spreading of[NEWLINE]your religion.
Your advisors have convened to[NEWLINE]to offer suggestions to manage[NEWLINE]your growing peasant population.
Allocate the majority to the fields.
Increase the number working in your cities.
The peasants are fine as they are.
A rediscovery of classical ideas[NEWLINE]has lead to a cultural renaissance[NEWLINE]amoung your people.
Be a benifactor of the arts.
Invest in the education of your people.
Great Artist and[NEWLINE]Great Musician are born[NEWLINE]-40 [ICON_GOLD]Gold
Your ciilization is experiencing an[NEWLINE]Industrial Revolution, how will[NEWLINE]you guide this change?
We need to increase our industrial output.
The health of the people should come first.
Perhaps we can find a balance.
You have recieved information of[NEWLINE]an impending terrorist attack.
Construct Police Station[NEWLINE]in all cities[NEWLINE]-85% attack chance -400 [ICON_GOLD]Gold
The people of your nation seem[NEWLINE]to be growing restless with[NEWLINE]the status quo.
Focus resources on finding a[NEWLINE]new Tenant to guide them.
Embark on a building projet to[NEWLINE]appease them.
If they worked harder, there'd be[NEWLINE]less time to complain.
Your space program is prepared[NEWLINE]to establish a permenant base[NEWLINE]on Mars.
Establish a resource base to[NEWLINE]mine the planet.
Establish a science base[NEWLINE]to carry out research.
Establish a colony base[NEWLINE]to relieve overcrowding.
-2 Population per city over 6[NEWLINE]+5 gold per turn per colonist from taxes
With the growing population of cities[NEWLINE]Tribal Elders fear the loss of their culture.
Establish a National Holiday[NEWLINE]to preserve the local customs.
Enact laws to impose the[NEWLINE]following of tradition.
Change is inevitable[NEWLINE]the old ways always die out.
A horde of barbarians are threatening[NEWLINE]one of your cities, but offer to leave[NEWLINE]for a small tribute.
Pay 100 [ICON_GOLD]Gold to assure the[NEWLINE]safty of your city.
Offer 25 [ICON_GOLD]Gold[NEWLINE]and hope it will appease them.
We do not negotiate with savages.
{1_sCsName} has proposed an arranged marriage[NEWLINE]to strengthen the bonds between you.
Offer one of your nobels as[NEWLINE}a much better choice.
It appears the rodent population is[NEWLINE]becoming overwhelming in your cities.
Commission sewage systems in all your cities.
Establish a sanitation department[NEWLINE]to clean up the cities.
Suggest a new dish to local eateries,[NEWLINE]then tax it.
There have been reports that[NEWLINE]{1_otherName} has secretly been[NEWLINE]plotting against you.
Send a covert team to[NEWLINE]sabotage their military.
Sent a diplomatic envoy to[NEWLINE]try and strengthen relations.
I don't trust vague reports,[NEWLINE]let's just wait and see.
There is a growing Save Our Forest movement.[NEWLINE]It's leaders are holding protests demanding[NEWLINE]you close down lumber mills.
Offer a compromise and[NEWLINE]agree to close half your mills.
Make a symbolic gesture[NEWLINE]by closing one mill.
Arrest the leaders of the group and build a new mill [NEWLINE]to make a point.
Loss of {1_numKill} lumber mills[NEWLINE]Happiness +4 per city
A council of City-States demands you act[NEWLINE]to lessen worries of nuclear proliferation.
Offer to reduce your stockpile of Uranium.
Show them you won't be bullied[NEWLINE]by investing in improved techniques.
Assure them there's no need for worry[NEWLINE]and keep things as they are.
Reduce Uranium by {1_iUraniumCut}[NEWLINE]Increase relations with CIty-States
Incease Uranium by {1_iUraniumCut}[NEWLINE]Reduce relations with City-States
Astronomers have discovered a large asteroid on[NEWLINEon an impact course with the planet.
Attempt to slam a probe into it to[NEWLINE]alter its course.
Launch a ship to try and[NEWLINE]push the asteroid into safer orbit.
Prep your nuclear missiles for launch[NEWLINE]and blow the thing to bits.
Might work, might leave you with[NEWLINE]hundres of smaller ones
A group of exiles from {1_csName}[NEWLINE]are seeking asylum in {1_capName}.
A pack of wolves[NEWLINE]are harassing local farmers near {1_targetName}.
Hire trappers to tend to the problem.
Convince local citizens to[NEWLINE]volunteer to hunt them.
I have more important thing to deal with.
-1 population in {1_targetName}.[NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_GOLD]Gold, +1 [ICON_FOOD]Food per turn[NEWLINE] for 10 turns.
We have word a master Shipwright from {1_otherCivName}[NEWLINE]Is visiting in your lands.
Commission him to build an andvanced vessel.
Arrest him on trumped up charges[NEWLINE]and put him to work.
Offer him best wishes for his visit[NEWLINE]and let him be.
Produce Venetian Galleass.[NEWLINE]Diplomatic penalties, possible retaliation.
Church Leaders have grown concerned[NEWLINE]by the spread of false religions.
Expel all foriegn missionaries[NEWLINE]and Prophets for 25 turns.
Strenghen your followers faith[NewLINE]by holding a religious festival.
People must be free to chose[NEWLINE]their own religion.
No foriegn religious units for 25 turns.[NEWLINE]-2 Happiness per city for 25 turns.
There is a growing sentament then[NEWLINE]slavery is barbaric and people are[NEWLINE]calling for it's abolishment.
Completely abolish the practice of slavery.
Leave the decision up to individual cities.
Salvery is a necessity of our industry and[NEWLINE]economy, and shall be further utilized.
Lose Slavery Policy branch.[NEWLINE]Close any slave markets.[NEWLINE]+5 Happiness per city[NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_CITIZEN]Population per city(from freed slaves)
-3 production in cities that choose.[NEWLINE]Closure of their slave markets.[NEWLINE]+3 Happiness per city
-3 Happiness per city[NEWLINE]Possiblity of protest or revolution.[NEWLINE]+10 [ICON_RES_MANPOWER]manpower[NEWLINE]+5 [ICON_GOLD]Gold per turn
The people of {1_csName} are restless[NEWLINE] and desire to be free. The revolutionary council[NEWLINE] of {1_csName}has decreed that they wish to have their independence.
{1_csName} is liberated.[NEWLINE]+10 Happiness[NEWLINE]Ally with City State[NEWLINE]+5 [ICON_CULTURE]Culture per turn
Your militay leaders are seeking funding[NEWLINE]to improve combat effectiveness.
There is no room[NEWLINE]in the budget.
All current units combat strength[NEWLINE]increased by 1[NEWLINE]-500 [ICON_GOLD]Gold
A new designer drug has hit the streets[NEWLINE]Though the dangers of the drug are[NEWLINE]not fully known, you Health advisors][NEWLINE]recommend action.
New Drugs always mean problems,[NEWLINE]outlaw it completely.
Regulate the drug and[NEWLINE]research any medical applications.
Let the people do what they want,[NEWLINE]just as long as we tax it.
+4 happiness per city[NEWLINE]+10 gold per turn[NEWLINE]-3 [ICON_PRODUCTION]Production and -3 [ICON_HEALTH]Health in cities
In order to reduce the burden[NEWLINE]on cities of housing criminals,[NEWLINE]an off-planet penal colony has been proposed.
Build the colony and[NEWLINE]begin transporting prisoners.
We don't need to waste money on infrastructure,[NEWLINE]just drop them on site and[NEWLINE]let them fend for themselves.
The situation is fine as it is.
While working in the fields[NEWLINE]farmers have unearthed strange giant bones.
Allow your shamen[NEWLINE]to create a mythology around them.
Stundy the bones in an attempt[NEWLINE]to discern their true nature.
As the ruler of this great nation,[NEWLINE]You have the authority to make[NEWLINE]your word the law.
Establish a code of laws to guide your people.
Allow individual cities to decide their own laws.
I kind of enjoy anything goes.
+3 [ICON_ORDER]Order in all cities[NEWLINE]-1 happiness per city.
+1 [ICON_ORDER]Order in all cities[NEWLINE]+1 happiness per city.
You advisors recommend the placement[NEWLINE]of local Magistrates to administer[NEWLINE]the law.
Appoint one magistrate to travel between cities.
The cities can hadle such things.
The local authorities wish to force[NEWLINE]the populus into service as[NEWLINE]part of a night watch.
Make it a law and[NELINE]fine all those who[NEWLINE]do not comply.
Offer a small salary and hire[NEWLINE]a professional force.
Kill the first who does not[NEWLINE]show for duty.
+2 [ICON_ORDER]Order in all cities[NEWLINE]+ 2 [ICON_GOLD]Gold per turn[NEWLINE]-3 Happiness.
The Church has become very Powerful[NEWLINE]and is exerting its' word as law.
We must follow the will of God.
We will compromise with the Church[NEWLINE]and allow them authority over relegious matters.
My word is the law![NEWLINE]Have the church leaders imprisoned,[NEWLINE]and I shall be head.
We have a growing prison population[NEWLINE]and there are concerns as to[NEWLINE]how to deal with them.
Re-evaluate their sentences, and release[NEWLINE] those who needn't be there.
Form chain gangs and put them to work.
Stage public executions and show the people[NEWLIME]the price of crime.
-2 [ICON_ORDER]Order in all cities[NEWLINE]+2 Happiness[NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_CULTURE]Culture per turn.
+5 [ICON_ORDER]Order in all cities[NEWLINE]-3 [ICON_CULTURE]Culture per turn[NEWLINE]-2 Happiness.
There are those who beleive we have a[NEWLINE]responsbility to battle world hunger.
Have cities with extra food donate their excess.
Invest in a programto teach better[NEWLINE]argicultural methods to areas in need.
If they can't feed themselves,that will make[NEWLINE]them easier to conquer later on.
Your Scientists beleive they have developed a[NEWLINE]new bio-weapon that will allow[NEWLINE]you to defeat any enemy.
We should be causious, it's needs to be fully understood[NEWLINE]before any actual production.
The effects of bio-warfare are too horrendous[NEWLINE]We have no need for such weapons.
Astronamers are warning of an intense solar cycle.[NEWLINE]They say there is a 23% chance of flares disrupting[NEWLINE]our electrical systems.
Invest in a proposed Solar Sheild system.
The ground about the city of {1_targetName} has begun trembling[NEWLINE]causing fear and worry amoung its' residents.
They must have angered the gods, A sacrifice must be made.
Evacuate the people briefly until it subsides.
There is no reason to fear, the earth bows before me.
A brilliant engineer has developed a new method[NEWLINE]of irrigation and that would improve our crop yield.
Commission him to oversee its' development in our cities.
Enslave him and force him to work for us.
Sieze his plans, then kill him so no other nation can benifit.
Brigands have kidnapped a Noble of you court[NEWLINE]whom is very popular amoungst your people.
Pay the Ransom for his safe return.
Have every Brigand band in your territory hunted[NEWLINE]down tortured and slayed.
If the people love him so much, let them raise the ransom.
Death of any Brigands within borders[NEWLINE]-3 Happiness, unless noble is found[NEWLINE]Possible loss of unit(s).
Three guilds are vying for your favor,[NEWLINE]it is your choice which you shall bless.
Spies have discovered one of your generals[NEWLINE]is plotting against you.
Execute him publicly as a warning to others.
It has been uncovered that your Finace Minister[NEWLINE]has been embezzling state funds.
Cover up his scandal, and quitely have him replaced.
Seize his assets and have him executed.
The prevelence of war, with {1_iWars} active conflicts had lead to[NEWLINE]A special summit being held on the matter.
Promote the signing of peace treaties.
Argue the justifications of the wars.
Analysts are warning that unless we develop better techniques,[NEWLINE]we are heading for a collapse in our oil production.
Have your scientists focus on new refinement technologies.
A large hurricane in on course for impact with {1_targetName}[NEWLINE]Your researches procalim this to be the perfect opportunity[NEWLINE]to test their new system for weather control.
I have to utmost confidence in our technology,[NEWLINE]Deploy the system.
Deploy the system, but take no chances,[NEWLINE]evacuate the city first.
We will employ an untested technology,[NEWLINE]Evacuate the city and let the storm run its' course.
Possible avoidence of hurricane[NEWLINE]Safty of population.
Safty of population[NEWLINE]Definite damage to city and structures.
Your scouts have stumbled upon a foriegn tribe, however, they are[NEWLINE]unable to communicate verbally as their language is too different.
Have them attempt to communicate with hand signals.
Have them offer gifts of gold to show their peaceful intent.
Raze the village and enslave any survivors.
The local water source in {1_targetName} has been tainted[NEWLINE]residents are becoming ill, and may soon begin dying.
Have your engieers design an aqueduct to bring in clean water.
Have local Shaman perform a purification ritual.
-{1_iAquaCost} [ICON_GOLD]Gold[NEWLINE]Aqueduct built in city[NEWLINE](Price higher w/o Tech).
-{1_iToDie} population[NEWLINE]Remaining population stronger,[NEWLINE]+75 to city heal rate.
Some Members of the {1_civAdj} Senate are scheming[NEWLINE]to increase their power and undermine your rule.
Arrest the offending members for treason[NEWLINE]and punish them accordingly.
They are no more than advisors,[NEWLINE]My rule is absolute.
May lose units loyal to Senate Members.
The loss of countless scrolls of ancient knowledge[NEWLINE]to a great fire leaves your civilization[NEWLINE]on the brink of a dark age.
Agree with the Church that this was the will of God.
Dispatch your agents to recover[NEWLINE]any remaining copies of the scrolls.
Send diplomatic envoys to purchase copies[NEWLINE]from nation who may have them.
Scientists, artists, and prophets are flocking to[NEWLINE]your capital, all seeking your patronage.
As a reaction to recent pay cuts[NEWLINE]railway workers across the nation[NEWLINE]have gone on strike.
Subsidize the railroad companies[NEWLINE]if they agree to raise wages.
Arrest the organizers and send in[NEWLINE]troops to break the strike.
Let the companines deal with the problem.
Ecomomists are warning of an impending[NEWLINE]market crash.
Enact a stimulus plan to[NEWLINE]try and boost the economy.
Lower federal interest rates to[NEWLINE]try an stabilize the market.
The market will balance itself out.
A group of scientist and engineers are[NEWLINE]on the verge of producing advanced nanoassemblers[NEWLINE]that can greatly increase our industrial capacity.
Increase their funding for quicker production.
Conduct extensive studies to ensure they are safe to use.
Put the project on hold, we currently have more pressing matters.
